snippet.title: Official Trailer! Episode 19's "The Demon's Plan" and "Deep Desires" Now Available!
snippet.description:
Episode 19 is here! Launch a rescue mission to Nanda Parbat in "The Demon's Plan," and play "Deep Desires" to see how even Trigon's absence causes chaos. The new Episode is now available for members, and will be available for purchase starting December 9, 2015. 

Subscribe! http://ow.ly/kZGiZ 
Play DCUO for free now at: https://www.dcuniverseonline.com/?cid=1064373

DC Universe™ Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Comics universe. Create your own powerful Hero or Villain and experience true action combat as you fight alongside and against legendary characters such as Batman, Superman and The Joker, now available for PC, PlayStation®3, and PlayStation®4.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DCUniverseOnline
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/DCUO
Join the discussion on the official forums: https://forums.daybreakgames.com/dcuo/index.php
